content: These two attacks have a lot of weight to them, and leave him with considerable openings to get in plenty of hits while he retracts his weapon and resets his posture, so make the most of them!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellowbrow.md', within the main section titled 'Yellowbrow', specifically from the subsection 'Yellowbrow Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
These two attacks have a lot of weight to them, and leave him with considerable openings to get in plenty of hits while he retracts his weapon and resets his posture, so make the most of them!
